attributes.action: Change the law so that only people who have had a covid vaccination can fly
attributes.additional_details: So that people who for medical reasons cannot have the vaccine can travel on public transport and attend gatherings more safely.
attributes.background: Change the law so that only people with a Covid vaccine inoculation certificate stating they have been inoculated against COVID-19 ( or cannot be due to medical reasons such as allergy or immune compromised ) can use commercial airlines or airports , attend mass gatherings or use public transport.
